definition: of or relating to the structure of the body, an expression that relates to anatomy
details:
adjective
- of or relating to the structure of the body
= example: of or relating to the structure of the body
= synonyms: anatomic
- of or relating to the branch of morphology that studies the structure of organisms
= example: of or relating to the branch of morphology that studies the structure of organisms
= synonyms: anatomic
noun
- an expression that relates to anatomy
= synonyms: anatomical reference
